text: "Automatic" is a 1983 song by The Pointer Sisters. It was taken from their 10th studio album Break Out. It went to number 5 in the United States, number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in the Netherlands, number 1 in Ireland, number 15 in Australia, number 17 in Canada and number 8 in New Zealand. It was covered by Ultra Naté in 2007. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:The Pointer Sisters songs Category:Ultra Naté songs Category:Electronic rock songs
title: Automatic (Pointer Sisters song)
